definitions.definition: A gas-filled sac or float of some colonial marine coelenterates , such as the Portuguese man-of-war .
An aerial root , in mangroves etc., specialized for gaseous exchange .
An apparatus consisting of a bag with a tube and mouthpiece, which may be attached to the body. The bag contains oxygen to be breathed by the wearer in rescue work in mines, etc.

main_definition: ( zoology ) A gas-filled sac or float of some colonial marine coelenterates , such as the Portuguese man-of-war .
secondary_definitions: ( botany ) An aerial root , in mangroves etc., specialized for gaseous exchange .
An apparatus consisting of a bag with a tube and mouthpiece, which may be attached to the body. The bag contains oxygen to be breathed by the wearer in rescue work in mines, etc.
